title: Need new name that has somethin to do with Rengar, AMA about Rengar too if u like.
body: Any suggestions? Needs to have something to do with Rengar though so keep that in mind, will answer questions about Rengar too if anyone has any.

replies.body:
Too Long
Sounds alright
Probs taken.

its not too long, its exactly 16 characters. if your saying its too long in terms of your preference, then whatever
Django Unchained
Yes its taken by a level 10 account

Other names also available:
Hunters Domain
Unseen Predator
E Bola Strike
Went with Unseen Predator, took awhile for me to decide but this one just kept coming back to me, thanks!

Ya i meant my preference, not a fan of long names with the words stuck together.
Ah i get it now, might do that, we'll see, maybe Rango instead of Rengo?
Pretty sure every ability name in the game is taken by someone, could be wrong tho.

Not in OCE. Maybe NA, but OCE has plenty of open ones.

I typed them in the name changer in the client and it said they were available.
Maybe Tonight We Hunt? Or is that too vague?

> [{quoted}](name=NigguhDamus,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=blv2YoIJ,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2015-03-28T04:50:18.032+0000)
>
> Probs taken.

Ah yeah it is, just checked then.
If I mained Rengar i'd get four doran blades (Ryan Choi's build), I'd call myself FourDoran
I main top but will jungle if needed so that name ain't an option for me.
Where do you play him what build etc?

Top or Jungle, pref top tho.

The build path is always different but the items are pretty much the same every game.
(not in order)
-Sword Of The Occult
-Hydra
-Youmuu's
-Last Whisper
-Infinity Edge
-Phantom Dancer
-CDR boots

Sell SOTO for IE last item and replace boots for another PD when full build thus giving me 100% crit, rarely and i mean rarely will i get GA and when i'm jungling i might get mobility boots but i usually get CDR boots.
